verbose_text: A benefit of the LC-ESI-MS method is the subclass specific IgG glycosylation measurements, with the drawback of non separable IgG2 and IgG3 in the discovery cohort, which is due to the identical peptide moieties (E293EQFNSTFR301) of their tryptic Fc glycopeptides in Caucasians.
evidence: IgG glycosylation measurements, with the drawback of non-separable IgG2 and IgG3
